prompts: Create a green Pokemon that blends in with nature and has a sleek body.
I want a grass-type Pokemon with elegant features and a friendly demeanor.
Generate a Pokemon that is small, bipedal, and has a bright yellow accent.
Make a mythical creature inspired by Snivy with unusual floral patterns.
Imagine an evolved version of Snivy with enhanced agility and sharp features.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in forests and is known for its swift movements.
Give me a unique take on a grass-type starter Pokemon with vibrant colors.
